Purpose: Represents all users of the system including farmers, employees, and administrators
Represents a farm entity managed by users
Details specific crops grown on a farm
Details specific livestock raised on a farm
Represents employees managed under HR module
Items available for sale in the e-commerce module
Represents a customer order in the e-commerce module
Junction table for Order and Product relationship
Listings for market access where farmers can offer or seek products
Data collected from remote monitoring sensors on farms
